item.description:
Bella Luna Restaurant & Milky Way Lounge proudly presents "The Grill from Ipanema" - a celebration of Brazilian food, drink and music. The night will include a Bar-B-Q on their outdoor patio, Brazilian beers and mixed drinks, and live Samba music by Samba no Pé. From 6:00 to 9:00, guests can enjoy an all-you-can-eat Brazilian BBQ and live entertainment for only $30.

Purchase $30 advance tickets for dinner and music at  Brown Paper Ticket

Bella Luna Restaurants' executive chef, Sam Putnam will be manning the grill. Cooking up everything from Brazilian sausages, to chicken brochettes, to a black bean stew with vegetables and rice, there's are delicious options for everybody. The bar team will be concocting traditional Brazilian beverages such as Caipirinha's and offering traditional Brazilian beers. Performing traditional Samba music with a modern appeal, Samba no Pé will take the stage and perform two sets of lively music to round out the evening.  

Bella Luna Restaurant & Milky Way Lounge's mission is to create community through delicious food & beverages, art & music; to be a gathering place where everyone feels comfortable and has fun; and to build a better Boston by supporting the work of local non-profit organizations.

 

Below is a picture of the building in which Bella Luna and Milky Way are located.

 

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

 

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:

Create your route at  MBTA or  Hop Stop

Take the Orange Line to Stony Brook Station. As you exit the station, turn left and walk up Boylston Street to the first stoplight. At the light, take a right onto Amory Street. The Brewery Complex is 1/2 mile up on your left. Bella Luna & The Milky Way Lounge is on the first floor, main entrance is on the right hand side of the building next to the smokestack.

PARKING INFORMATION:  
There are 80 complementary parking spaces on the Amory Street side of The Brewery Complex (do not park in the 15 minute spots next to Amory street or you may be towed).
item.how_to_find_us: Everyone with a Yes RSVP will be emailed the details on Monday morning.
